thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 9 of 3524
thread.title: Laura

author: Laura
title: Laura
text: I've bought a few dozen books from Thriftbooks, and each one has arrived as quickly as possible, in great condition. I don't understand how the pricing is so low, but hey, I'm not complaining! I've been able to provide a bunch of inspirational reads to my clients (I'm an art therapist) to read in between sessions, without having to charge them at all! The books are so cheap, I can hand them out without worrying about getting them back at all!
